title: #239 - Natasha Leggero, Moshe Kasher, & ME
description:
Comedians & Spouses, Natasha Leggero & Moshe Kasher hang out in the Mancave to talk about the my love of the "Bro" lifestyle, hacky comedy in Alt and Club Comics alike, Fake News and Alt Right spin, Social Justice Warriors at Evergreen State College, and their upcoming "ENDLESS HONEYMOON TOUR". 

 

This episode is brought to you by Casper Mattresses - to get $50 off your purchase of a Casper Mattress go to : www.casper.com/bertcast and use the code "BERTCAST"

To find Natasha & Moshe on their ENDLESS HONEYMOON TOUR go to either http://www.natashaleggero.com OR http://moshekasher.com

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
